item.description:
CREATE THE LIFE YOU WANT!

Are you searching for your passion?

Do you want more out of life, but not sure what? Or you know, but need a little bit more confidence to achieve it?

Would you like to take your life and love it?

This workshop will show you some fun and easy ways to discover what you are meant to be doing, to believe you can have anything you want, and inspire you to take action to go after it.

You will go away with some great tools to start your journey of creating a more fulfilling life.

Presented by Jacki Rose, your organizer of FunStuff meetup group and author of the book “Take Your Life & Love It!”

Every attendee will get a complimentary copy of the book.

If you would like to learn more about this short and easy read, http://jackirose.com/products/take-your-life-love-it/

Cost: $20 in advance / $30 at the door pending availability

Time: 6:30 pm - 8:30 pm

Join us for dinner in the Cafe at 5:30 pm if you like.

If you prefer not to pay online, you may send a check made out to:
Jacki Rose, PO Box 98, Southborough, MA 01772
Once we receive your check, you will be added to the event list.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet for dinner at Cafe at 5:30 or Event Room for program at 6:30 pm.
item.name: Take Your Life & Love It! Workshop
